  1. Oxford 3000
  2. Oxford 26

Words 2501-2600

  1. spoon
    She used a spoon to stir her tea.

  2. sport
    Football is my favorite sport to watch.

  3. spot
    There is a small spot on your shirt.

  4. spread
    He spread butter on the bread.

  5. spring
    Flowers bloom in the spring.

  6. square
    The children played in the town square.

  7. stable
    The table is stable and does not wobble.

  8. stadium
    The stadium was full of cheering fans.

  9. staff
    The staff at the hotel were very helpful.

  10. stage
    She performed on the stage with confidence.

  11. stair
    He climbed the stair to the second floor.

  12. stamp
    I need a stamp to send this letter.

  13. stand
    Please stand here while I check your ticket.

  14. standard
    This hotel meets a high standard of quality.

  15. star
    The sky was clear, and we could see every star.

  16. stare
    He couldn’t help but stare at the beautiful painting.

  17. start
    We will start the meeting at 10 a.m.

  18. state
    She explained the state of the project to her team.

  19. statement
    His statement was clear and easy to understand.

  20. station
    The train arrived at the station on time.

  21. statistic
    The statistic shows an increase in sales this year.

  22. statue
    The statue in the park is made of bronze.

  23. status
    What is the status of the delivery?

  24. stay
    We decided to stay at a small hotel by the beach.

  25. steady
    Keep a steady pace while walking up the hill.

  26. steal
    Someone tried to steal her bag at the market.

  27. steel
    The bridge is made of strong steel.

  28. steep
    The hill was too steep to climb easily.

  29. step
    Take one step at a time to avoid falling.

  30. stick
    He used a stick to draw in the sand.

  31. sticky
    The honey made her hands sticky.

  32. stiff
    His legs felt stiff after the long walk.

  33. still
    The lake was still and reflected the sky.

  34. stock
    The store has a large stock of fresh fruit.

  35. stomach
    He had a pain in his stomach after eating too much.

  36. stone
    She picked up a small stone from the ground.

  37. stop
    Please stop talking and listen to the teacher.

  38. store
    I went to the store to buy some milk.

  39. storm
    The storm caused damage to many houses.

  40. story
    She told a funny story about her trip.

  41. straight
    Go straight ahead to reach the park.

  42. strange
    It was strange to see snow in the summer.

  43. stranger
    A stranger helped me find my way.

  44. strategy
    We need a new strategy to solve this problem.

  45. stream
    The stream flows gently through the forest.

  46. street
    The street was busy with cars and people.

  47. strength
    He showed great strength during the competition.

  48. stress
    She felt stress before her big exam.

  49. stretch
    He decided to stretch his arms after sitting for hours.

  50. strict
    The teacher is strict but fair with her students.

  51. strike
    The workers decided to strike for better pay.

  52. string
    She tied the package with a piece of string.

  53. strong
    He is strong enough to lift the heavy box.

  54. strongly
    I strongly believe that we can succeed.

  55. structure
    The structure of the building is very modern.

  56. struggle
    She had to struggle to carry the heavy bag.

  57. student
    The student asked a question during the lecture.

  58. studio
    The artist works in a small studio near her home.

  59. study
    He needs to study hard to pass the test.

  60. stuff
    She packed all her stuff into a small bag.

  61. stupid
    It was a stupid mistake to leave the door unlocked.

  62. style
    Her style of writing is very unique.

  63. subject
    History is my favorite subject in school.

  64. submit
    Please submit your assignment by Friday.

  65. substance
    The substance in the bottle is dangerous.

  66. succeed
    He worked hard to succeed in his career.

  67. success
    Her success is the result of years of effort.

  68. successful
    The event was very successful and well-organized.

  69. successfully
    She successfully completed the project on time.

  70. such
    It was such a beautiful day that we went for a walk.

  71. sudden
    There was a sudden change in the weather.

  72. suddenly
    The car suddenly stopped in the middle of the road.

  73. suffer
    He began to suffer from a bad headache.

  74. sugar
    She added a spoonful of sugar to her coffee.

  75. suggest
    Can you suggest a good book to read?

  76. suggestion
    Her suggestion helped us solve the problem.

  77. suit
    He wore a black suit to the wedding.

  78. suitable
    This dress is suitable for the occasion.

  79. sum
    The sum of two and three is five.

  80. summarize
    Can you summarize the main points of the article?

  81. summary
    The summary of the book was very helpful.

  82. summer
    We always go to the beach in the summer.

  83. sun
    The sun was shining brightly in the sky.

  84. Sunday
    We usually have a family dinner on Sunday.

  85. supermarket
    I bought some vegetables at the supermarket.

  86. supply
    The school provides a supply of books for students.

  87. support
    Her family gave her a lot of support during the competition.

  88. supporter
    He is a strong supporter of the local football team.

  89. suppose
    I suppose we can finish the work by tomorrow.

  90. sure
    Are you sure this is the right way?

  91. surely
    Surely, we can find a solution to this problem.

  92. surface
    The surface of the table was smooth and clean.

  93. surgery
    She had to undergo surgery to fix her knee.

  94. surprise
    The party was a complete surprise for her.

  95. surprised
    I was surprised to see him at the event.

  96. surprising
    It is surprising how quickly the weather changed.

  97. surround
    Trees surround the small house in the forest.

  98. surrounding
    The surrounding area is full of beautiful hills.

  99. survey
    We conducted a survey to gather opinions.

  100. survive
    He managed to survive in the wild for a week.
